name: Anuj Kumar
description:
Thanks for Viewing My Profile :-)

Hi,
I am an SEO expert, apart from this, I love the Internet so that I came to Internet Marketing. Now I am a became a professional online marketing expert. :)

Now I have around 4 years of working experience in SEO, SEM & SMM.

Being a Team Lead in SEO in the organization, I have worked on many major projects. My key responsibilities and working experiences are as follows:-

• Optimized different types of domains (websites) like News, Software, Jewelry, Watches, Fashion Accessories, Travel, BPO, IT, Real Estate, Health and Pharmaceutical, Educational and E-commerce websites.

• Website SEO Audit, Competitor Analysis, and Keyword Research.

• On Page Optimization: Meta Tags Optimization (including titles, descriptions & keywords), H tags (heading tags) optimization, Image & Hyperlink Optimization, Internal link structuring and optimization, URL re-writing, Custom 404 error page creation and implementation, fix URL canonicalization issue (301 re-direction), HTML Code Cleanup & Optimization, Robots.txt Creation, Google Webmaster Tools Account Setup & Monitoring, Google Analytics Setup & Integration.

• Off-Page Optimization: Article submission, Blog Submission, Forum Submission, Social Media Marketing, Press Releases, etc.


- Love & Best Regards
- Anuj Kumar
